Name: Ironsmith Medieval Simulator: Prologue
About the game: Ironsmith: Medieval Simulator - Prologue allows you to become the local blacksmith in medieval reality. Master your skills by ceaselessly crafting tools and weapons for various social classes. Educate yourself in your family profession under the guidance of your father, at a time of uncertainty, while the gales of war are howling through your lands. Immerse yourself in the story of a local blacksmith dragged into the service of the reigning baron, and help to defend the village by forging weapons for his soldiers. Blacksmithing Learn to craft small tools for your neighbors, hone your skills with time and create equipment for soldiers. Modify and decorate your creations however you choose. The story From your hometown to your own village workshop â€“ experience the first episode of Ironsmith and acquaint yourself with the world, its possibilities and some of the mechanics that the full game will offer: Meet the local folk and learn about their worries. Run your own workshop and accumulate wealth. Collect orders posted on the bulletin board by the distressed locals and help them protect their loved ones by forging weapons. Visit the nearby market and pop into the nearby tavern, to gossip with the innkeeper and drink a cold one (gingerly)!
